subDepartments.name: Birmingham Radio
subDepartments.description: Provide radio communication services for the city.
features: Bring You One of the most happiest and funniest communities out there.
Provide you with non stop beats from SSU all the way to SSD.
We Have a Great Staff team Bringing you the Best Songs and Entertainment Out there.
We also are frequentely Releasing Our Entertainment & Radio Team Applications.

subDepartments.name: Birmingham Food Company
subDepartments.description: Catering services for events and daily operations.
features: We provide food for all events in the city.
We have a variety of food options to choose from.
We cater for all dietary requirements.
We provide food for the police department and other city departments.
